posts.raw_content:
The pressure on President Trump right now is immense—balancing war and peace, threats and diplomacy, while dealing with maniac leftists, political enemies, and global uncertainty. 

Few beyond Trump would dare to play this high-stakes game, but Trump isn’t just any leader. In this place we call him GEOTUS.   Where others hesitate, he moves—forcing Iran to reckon with a simple choice: negotiate or face consequences. He's saying,: America will not be ignored. 


But the threat is real. One misstep, one miscalculation, and the Middle East could explode, his enemies pounce, and nations become emboldened. The world is watching, allies are nervous, and the stakes couldn’t be higher. 

**Pray for President Trump.**
posts.author: I-am-Orlando
posts.title: Why we should pray for President Trump
posts.content:
The pressure on President Trump right now is immense—balancing war and peace, threats and diplomacy, while dealing with maniac leftists, political enemies, and global uncertainty.

Few beyond Trump would dare to play this high-stakes game, but Trump isn’t just any leader. In this place we call him GEOTUS. Where others hesitate, he moves—forcing Iran to reckon with a simple choice: negotiate or face consequences. He's saying,: America will not be ignored.

But the threat is real. One misstep, one miscalculation, and the Middle East could explode, his enemies pounce, and nations become emboldened. The world is watching, allies are nervous, and the stakes couldn’t be higher.

Pray for President Trump.
